name: dhan-tracker
description: Dhan Portfolio Tracker with React frontend and FastAPI backend

scripts.dev: concurrently -n "Backend,Frontend" -c "blue,green" "uvicorn server:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm run build && cd .. && rm -rf static && mv frontend/dist static
scripts.build:win: cd frontend && npm run build && cd .. && if exist static rmdir /s /q static && move frontend\dist static
